fileannotations-desc: Displays and edits annotations on file pages.
file-has-annotations: There are annotations on this file. Mouse over the image to view them.
apihelp-query+fileannotations-descriptio: Fetch wikitext and optionally HTML for annotations on a file on the wiki.
apihelp-query+fileannotations-param-pars: Whether to fetch the parsed annotations. Could take longer with many, large, or complex annotations.
